title: Create - Marketing & Promotions Lead Role
body:
Role: Marketing & Promotions Lead

Purpose: Promote Gamer DAO and bring in new contributing members.

Domains:

- Twitter Account

Accountabilities:
- Keep the governance records of this role/squad up-to-date below. Copy and paste approved Snapshot proposal links with the proposal title in Gov. Records section.

- Refine the messaging of Gamer DAO

- Find creative and effective ways to share Gamer DAO with the world.

- Make marketing content easily accessible for members to share
author: 0x380C7200892581b7392CA00DA759A4072B67460D
